radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild basilar atelectasis in the lung bases, normal liver with tiny segment II hypodensity, extensive diverticulosis in the descending and sigmoid colon, 2 adjacent inflamed diverticula in proximal sigmoid colon, surrounding fat stranding and fascial thickening, reactive lymph node enlargement, and small right and moderate-sized left fat containing inguinal hernias. No pleural or pericardial effusion, no intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation, unremarkable gallbladder, pancreas, spleen, and bilateral adrenal glands.
